title: Baskerville
content:
Hello, I´m making a work about Baskerville typography and I´m trying to find some logos using this typography. Can anyone tell me any product or company who use this typography in their logo?

Thank you
author: houndofbaskerville

comments.content:
There's a couple of examples linked on [this page at Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804064640/http:/www.linotype.com/310/baskerville.html).

Edit: Sorry, those aren't actually \*logos\* using the font.
thanks so much to both of you :)
